Magazine Design for Group Discussions and Interviews

Interview Collection from MBA Exams in India for MBA Aspirants

CLIENT Pagalguy - Inzane Labs Pvt. Ltd.

THE CHALLENGE

Designing a magazine that incorporates about 100 group discussions and personal interviews in a compact, visual and interesting layout

RESULTS

The Magazine was printed and handed out to students who are studying in coaching classes as a promotion for Pagalguy. We saw an increase in the engagement on the Pagalguy platform.

THE BRIEF

I was working as a UX/Graphics Designer at Pagalguy and the design manager, marketing team and I figured that we had a collection of group discussions and personal interviews in our database. We decided to transform them into a magazine.
